title: SBT GRVL Launches Mentorship Program and Femmes Team Competition to Help More Women Experience Gravel Racing
content:
The program features six mentors and 100 spots to guide women through the experience of gravel racing.

Read the full article at SBT GRVL Launches Mentorship Program and Femmes Team Competition to Help More Women Experience Gravel Racing on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
